mapper.insert: insert into message( message_no, message_sender, message_sender_level, message_receiver, message_receiver_level, message_content, message_time ) values( #{messageNo}, #{messageSender}, #{messageSenderLevel}, #{messageReceiver}, #{messageReceiverLevel}, #{messageContent}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select * from message order by message_no asc
